block.name: Receiver Logger
block.make: self.$(id) = blocksat.rx_logger( $samp_rate, $(snr_meter()), $snr_log_period, $(frame_synchronizer()), $frame_sync_log_period, $(decoder()), $ber_log_period, $(cfo_rec()), $cfo_log_period, $enabled_start, (None if not hasattr(self, 'set_fs_label') else self.set_fs_label), (None if not hasattr(self, 'set_ber_label') else self.set_ber_label), (None if not hasattr(self, 'set_freq_offset_label') else self.set_freq_offset_label) )
block.doc:
Blocksat Receiver Logger
Collects metrics from various gr-blocksat blocks and logs them periodically into the console.
Also helps with GUI label updates for GUI-based receivers. Assumes that variables "fs_label" and "ber_label" are defined in the flowgraph for the frame synchronization state and the bit error rate stats, respectively. Automatically passes the setter for these variables into the actual "Rx Logger" work function.
